title: I can't invate in a club
body:
Hey, i can't invate in a club this user: s131902
I get messege that she is new and i need try again later, but she is alredy lv3.

replies.body: It's likely you just need to wait a bit longer. I'm not 100% sure but it seems like you need to be a player for a certain amount of time, or have been friends for a certain amount of time before you can join clubs.
